elements.name: Verify that the homepage loads successfully.

steps.name: I am on the homepage of Urban Ladder.
The page title should contain "Urban Ladder".

elements.name: Verify user can sign up successfully

steps.name: I am on the homepage of Urban Ladder.
Hover on the profile icon
Click on the Sign Up button
Complete the signup process with email and password "Testing1!"
Verify My Account is visible

elements.name: Verify user can LOG OUT successfully

steps.name: I am on the homepage of Urban Ladder.
Hover on the profile icon
Click on the Sign Up button
Complete the signup process with email and password "Testing1!"
Verify My Account is visible
Click on logout button
Verify Login button is visible

name: User Signup
description:
As a user,
  I want to sign up on Urban Ladder
  So that I can create an account and access personalized features.

steps.name: Hover on the profile icon
Click on the Sign Up button
Complete the signup process with email and password "Testing1!"

elements.name: Verify the search functionality with a valid product

steps.name: I am on the homepage of Urban Ladder.
I search for "Sofa" from search bar
The search results should display items related to "Sofa"
Hover on the profile icon
Click on the Sign Up button
Complete the signup process with email and password "Testing1!"
